basic_information.scholarship_name: Gean B. Atkinson Scholarship for Advertising Excellence
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Gean B. Atkinson Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established to be awarded to a Mass Communication major who is actively involved in the professional community. Mr. Atkinson earned two journalism degrees from UCO and has served as a journalism instructor. An advertising agency owner, he also served in the Oklahoma Legislature and as a governor's communications director. He is a decorated Vietnam veteran of the U.S. Marine Corps. Eligibility Requirements Strategic Communications Major Junior or Senior standing Must be working in strategic communications (part-time, full-time, or internship) Minimum 2.5 GPA Must be an Oklahoma resident Continuing student for the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
